main_definition: Able to bend easily without breaking or resisting change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily adaptable or able to adjust with little effort.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was flexible about the date, willing to move it if necessary.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physically pliable and capable of bending without breaking.
meanings_and_examples.example: The rubber band is very flexible; it can stretch a lot before snapping.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Open to new ideas, opinions, or changes in plans.
meanings_and_examples.example: He's quite flexible when it comes to trying out new restaurants with his friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to bend easily without breaking under pressure.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company policy is very flexible, allowing employees to work from home if they need to.
